info.name: Good & Evil
info.attribution:

info.description: A tactical confrontation full of bluffing. Will your spirits be the smartest?
info.ruleText:
Starting formation
Left/right players place their pieces in a 2x4 vertical formation, located between their respective star cells.

Move
On their turn, a player can move one of their pieces onto:
- an empty orthogonally adjacent cell 
- an orthogonally adjacent cell containing an opponent's piece

Goal
A player can win by:
- escaping from an opponent's star cell with a blue piece
- capturing 4 blue pieces from the opponent
- having their 4 red pieces captured by the opponent
info.helpText:
- Left & right players take seats and drag their pieces from their stock into a starting formation of their choice
- Each player has their own holder for tracking captured pieces
- Piece's colors (red/blue) are not visible by opponent except when moved into capture or exit holders
- To automatically capture an opponent's piece, drag and drop your piece onto the targeted cell

To restart a match, click on the "Clean up" button which will recall and shuffle pieces
